name: luqma
description: Recipe search application with nutritional information and dynamic ingredient exclusion

scripts.setup: npm run build:backend && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "sleep 15 && npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend

author: Ahmad Shalabi
